statements: UPDATE wallet_balances SET wallet_balance = 100 WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE wallet_balances SET user_id = 2, wallet_balance = 150
UPDATE wallet_balances SET wallet_balance = wallet_balance + 100.50 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE wallet_balances SET wallet_balance = 500.75 WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE WalletBalances SET balance = 100.50 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 50.75, transaction_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE transaction_id = 456
UPDATE WalletBalances SET balance = balance + 100, last_updated = '2021-10-21 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = amount - 50, transaction_date = '2021-10-22', transaction_type = 'debit' WHERE user_id = 2 AND transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE wallet_accounts SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.50, transaction_type = 'WITHDRAWAL' WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE wallet_accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.00 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 500.00, transaction_date = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE wallet_accounts SET balance = 500.00 WHERE id = 100
UPDATE wallet_updates SET updated_balance = 600.75, update_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE account_id = 200
UPDATE wallet_accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.50 WHERE id = 1234;
UPDATE wallet_updates SET updated_balance = 5000.75, update_date = '2022-01-10 08:30:00' WHERE account_id = 5678;
UPDATE WalletAccount SET balance = 500 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE WalletTransaction SET amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-20 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE WalletTransaction SET amount = 50.25, transaction_type = 'withdrawal' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE WalletHistory SET balance = balance + 50.25, history_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
